remarks: Closure of the vector space to dual space scalar map, in the scalar sigma map.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Jun-2015.)
statement:
hgmapdcl.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hgmapdcl.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hgmapdcl.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
hgmapdcl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
hgmapdcl.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
hgmapdcl.q $e |- Q = ( Scalar ` C ) $.
hgmapdcl.a $e |- A = ( Base ` Q ) $.
hgmapdcl.g $e |- G = ( ( HGMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hgmapdcl.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hgmapdcl.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. B ) $.
hgmapdcl $p |- ( ph -> ( G ` F ) e. A ) $.
